title: fried squid rings with yuzu dressing
description: A double helping of squid, stir-fried in a homemade black bean sauce and deep-fried squid rings.
ingredients: 4 tsp ready-made chilli and garlic sauce
2 tsp yuzu juice, to taste (available from some supermarkets and Asian grocers, or specialist online retailers)
1 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
1½ tbsp cooked black beans, rinsed and coarsely chopped
2 spring onions, sliced into thin strips, to garnish
1 red chilli, sliced into thin strips, to garnish
4 medium squid, cleaned, quills and beaks removed, sliced into 1cm/½in rings
salt and freshly ground black pepper
